fields.name: mock
description: Data relating to the mocked function such as call arguments and return values.
You shouldn't need to access this directly. Instead, a range of mock function matchers are provided as abstractions.

fields.name: calls
fields.description: Array of calls, where each call is an array of the arguments that were passed to the mock function.

fields.name: lastCall
fields.description: Array of arguments that the mock function was last called with, or `nil` if it hasn't been called.

fields.name: results
fields.description: Array of results that the mock function has returned or thrown.

fields.name: lastResult
fields.description: The result that the mock function last returned or threw, or `nil` if it hasn't been called.
